name: StakeOut!
description:
StakeOut! is an arcade shooting game that was made for the Orange County Lockdown Game Jam. You play as a police officer who is tasked the prevent the spread of the Coronavirus. You must knockout or possibly kill as many people as possible in that neighborhood to prevent anyone from leaving their homes and possibly spread the virus. 

Controls:

Mouse: Move Cursor Around

Left Mouse Button: Shoot 

Right Mouse Button: Reload

Spacebar: Pause

Backspace: Reset Hi-Scores

Credits:

Nicholas Walton: Designer, Programmer, UI Artist, Music, and Additional Art

Brian Wallace: Artist and Animator

Jeremiah Garcia: Sound Effects, Music and Additional Design

Special Thanks: 
Samuel Arminana
Kaitlin Long
(For the Pizza and everything else!)

Game Engine: Clickteam Fusion 2.5

On behalf of the StakeOut! team, we hope you enjoy StakeOut! And look forward to any of our future projects. And don't forget to comment and review!
